rules_text:
Menace
Whenever Dreadborn Demon deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
When Dreadborn Demon dies, manifest dread twice. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put one onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature and the other into your graveyard. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
